title: The new rune system is so innovative and offers so many options
body:
But if I can't do this, it's not:

https://i.imgur.com/UUlMaxF.png
https://i.imgur.com/Nzsy3rc.png
https://i.imgur.com/9KbqnK4.png

Not to mention the +900 mana rune page along with max crit chance / damage.
